verses.verse: הוֹד֣וּ <WH3034> ho-Du O give thanks לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- for ט֑וֹב <WH2896> Tov; for [he is] good כִּ֖י <WH3588> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> chas-Do. for his mercy

ה֭וֹדוּ <WH3034> Ho-du O give thanks לֵֽאלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> le-lo-Hei unto the God הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him; of gods כִּ֖י <WH3588> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> chas-Do. for his mercy

ה֭וֹדוּ <WH3034> Ho-du O give thanks לַאֲדֹנֵ֣י <WH113> la-'a-do-Nei to the Lord הָאֲדֹנִ֑ים <WH113> ha-'a-do-Nim; of lords כִּ֖י <WH3588> ki for לְעֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> chas-Do. for his mercy

לְעֹ֘שֵׂ֤ה <WH6213> le-'O-Seh To him who alone doeth נִפְלָא֣וֹת <WH6381> nif-la-'ot wonders גְּדֹל֣וֹת <WH1419> ge-do-Lot great לְבַדּ֑וֹ <WH905> le-vad-Do; alone כִּ֖י <WH3588> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> chas-Do. for his mercy

לְעֹשֵׂ֣ה <WH6213> le-'o-Seh made הַ֭שָּׁמַיִם <WH8064> Hash-sha-ma-yim the heavens בִּתְבוּנָ֑ה <WH8394> bit-vu-Nah; To him that by wisdom כִּ֖י <WH3588> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> chas-Do. for his mercy

לְרֹקַ֣ע <WH7554> le-ro-Ka' To him that stretched out הָ֭אָרֶץ <WH776> Ha-'a-retz the earth עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- above הַמָּ֑יִם <WH4325> ham-Ma-yim; above the waters כִּ֖י <WH3588> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> chas-Do. for his mercy

לְ֭עֹשֵׂה <WH6213> Le-'o-seh To him that made אוֹרִ֣ים <WH216> o-Rim lights גְּדֹלִ֑ים <WH1419> ge-do-Lim; great כִּ֖י <WH3588> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> chas-Do. for his mercy

אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַ֭שֶּׁמֶשׁ <WH8121> Hash-she-mesh The sun לְמֶמְשֶׁ֣לֶת <WH4475> le-mem-She-let to rule בַּיּ֑וֹם <WH3117> bai-Yom; by day כִּ֖י <WH3588> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> chas-Do. for his mercy

אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַיָּרֵ֣חַ <WH3394> hai-ya-Re-ach The moon וְ֭כוֹכָבִים <WH3556> Ve-cho-cha-vim and stars לְמֶמְשְׁל֣וֹת <WH4475> le-mem-she-Lot to rule בַּלָּ֑יְלָה <WH3915> bal-La-ye-lah; by night כִּ֖י <WH3588> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> chas-Do. for his mercy

לְמַכֵּ֣ה <WH5221> le-mak-Keh To him that smote מִ֭צְרַיִם <WH4714> Mitz-ra-yim Egypt בִּבְכוֹרֵיהֶ֑ם <WH1060> biv-cho-rei-Hem; in their firstborn כִּ֖י <WH3588> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> chas-Do. for his mercy

וַיּוֹצֵ֣א <WH3318> vai-yo-Tze And brought out יִ֭שְׂרָאֵל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'el Israel מִתּוֹכָ֑ם <WH8432> mit-to-Cham; from among כִּ֖י <WH3588> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> chas-Do. them for his mercy

בְּיָ֣ד <WH3027> be-Yad hand חֲ֭זָקָה <WH2389> Cha-za-kah With a strong וּבִזְר֣וֹעַ <WH2220> u-viz-Ro-a' arm נְטוּיָ֑ה <WH5186> ne-tu-Yah; and with a stretched out כִּ֖י <WH3588> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> chas-Do. for his mercy

לְגֹזֵ֣ר <WH1504> le-go-Zer To him which divided יַם־ <WH3220> yam- sea ס֭וּף <WH5488> suf the Red לִגְזָרִ֑ים <WH1506> lig-za-Rim; into parts כִּ֖י <WH3588> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> chas-Do. for his mercy

וְהֶעֱבִ֣יר <WH5674> ve-he-'e-Vir to pass through יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El And made Israel בְּתוֹכ֑וֹ <WH8432> be-to-Cho; the midst כִּ֖י <WH3588> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> chas-Do. of it for his mercy

וְנִ֘עֵ֤ר <WH5287> ve-Ni-'Er But overthrew פַּרְעֹ֣ה <WH6547> par-'Oh Pharaoh וְחֵיל֣וֹ <WH2428> ve-chei-Lo and his host בְיַם־ <WH3220> ve-yam- sea ס֑וּף <WH5488> Suf; in the Red כִּ֖י <WH3588> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> chas-Do. for his mercy

לְמוֹלִ֣יךְ <WH1980> le-mo-Lich led עַ֭מּוֹ <WH5971> am-mo his people בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> bam-mid-Bar; through the wilderness כִּ֖י <WH3588> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> chas-Do. for his mercy

לְ֭מַכֵּה <WH5221> Le-mak-keh To him which smote מְלָכִ֣ים <WH4428> me-la-Chim kings גְּדֹלִ֑ים <WH1419> ge-do-Lim; great כִּ֖י <WH3588> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> chas-Do. for his mercy

וַֽ֭יַּהֲרֹג <WH2026> Vai-ya-ha-rog And slew מְלָכִ֣ים <WH4428> me-la-Chim kings אַדִּירִ֑ים <WH117> 'ad-di-Rim; famous כִּ֖י <WH3588> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> chas-Do. for his mercy

לְ֭סִיחוֹן <WH5511> Le-si-chon Sihon מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech king הָאֱמֹרִ֑י <WH567> ha-'e-mo-Ri; of the Amorites כִּ֖י <WH3588> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> chas-Do. for his mercy

וּ֭לְעוֹג <WH5747> U-le-'og And Og מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech the king הַבָּשָׁ֑ן <WH1316> hab-ba-Shan; of Bashan כִּ֖י <WH3588> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> chas-Do. for his mercy

וְנָתַ֣ן <WH5414> ve-na-Tan And gave אַרְצָ֣ם <WH776> 'ar-Tzam their land לְנַחֲלָ֑ה <WH5159> le-na-cha-Lah; for an heritage כִּ֖י <WH3588> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> chas-Do. for his mercy

נַ֭חֲלָה <WH5159> Na-cha-lah [Even] an heritage לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <WH3478> le-Yis-ra-'El unto Israel עַבְדּ֑וֹ <WH5650> av-Do; his servant כִּ֖י <WH3588> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> chas-Do. for his mercy

שֶׁ֭בְּשִׁפְלֵנוּ <WH8216> be-shif-le-nu us in our low estate זָ֣כַר <WH2142> Za-char Who remembered לָ֑נוּ La-nu; כִּ֖י <WH3588> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> chas-Do. for his mercy

וַיִּפְרְקֵ֥נוּ <WH6561> vai-yif-re-Ke-nu And hath redeemed מִצָּרֵ֑ינוּ <WH6862> mitz-tza-Rei-nu; us from our enemies כִּ֖י <WH3588> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> chas-Do. for his mercy

נֹתֵ֣ן <WH5414> no-Ten Who giveth לֶ֭חֶם <WH3899> Le-chem food לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol to all בָּשָׂ֑ר <WH1320> ba-Sar; to all flesh כִּ֖י <WH3588> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> chas-Do. for his mercy

ה֭וֹדוּ <WH3034> Ho-du O give thanks לְאֵ֣ל <WH410> le-'El unto the God הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> hash-sha-Ma-yim; of heaven כִּ֖י <WH3588> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> chas-Do. for his mercy
